author: remm
msg: - Various fixes to support of lock-null properties. They are now included
in a PROPFIND, and it's now possible to retrieve their (blank) properties.
- Known issue : a lock-null property won't be removed when the associated

author: craigmcc
msg: Add an example filter that unconditionally sets the character encoding
(used to interpret request parameters when request.getParameter() and
friends are called) to a configurable value.  It is very easy to subclass
this filter to make it smarter about what encoding to select.  Examples of
things you might want to look at in selectEncoding() include:
* Any value(s) specified for the "Accept-Language" header, if you
can make assumptions about what encoding to use for specific locales.
* Any value specified for the "User-Agent" header, if you can make
assumptions based on the client browser.
* Any values you have stashed in a session associated with this request.

author: craigmcc
msg: Remove Emacs backup files inadvertently committed.

author: craigmcc
msg: Unit tests updated for the most recent fix on %\> recognition.

author: craigmcc
msg: Re-fix escaping so that %\> is recognized correctly (bugzilla #2602) AND
the Unicode literal string is still recognized correctly.
